Property.name: context
Property.Value: SELECT DISTINCT project.project_id FROM project JOIN project_category_lu ON project.project_category_id = project_category_lu.project_category_id JOIN project_status_lu ON project.project_status_id = project_status_lu.project_status_id JOIN project_type_lu ON project_category_lu.project_type_id = project_type_lu.project_type_id LEFT JOIN project_info ON project.project_id = project_info.project_id LEFT JOIN project_info_type_lu ON project_info.project_info_type_id = project_info_type_lu.project_info_type_id LEFT JOIN resource ON project.project_id = resource.project_id LEFT JOIN resource_info ON resource.resource_id = resource_info.resource_id LEFT JOIN resource_info_type_lu ON resource_info.resource_info_type_id = resource_info_type_lu.resource_info_type_id WHERE

Property.name: context
Property.Value: SELECT DISTINCT scorecard.scorecard_id FROM scorecard JOIN scorecard_status_lu ON scorecard.scorecard_status_id = scorecard_status_lu.scorecard_status_id JOIN scorecard_type_lu ON scorecard.scorecard_type_id = scorecard_type_lu.scorecard_type_id JOIN project_category_lu ON scorecard.project_category_id = project_category_lu.project_category_id WHERE

Property.name: context
Property.Value: SELECT UNIQUE(deliverable_id) FROM deliverable_lu CROSS JOIN project WHERE

Property.name: context
Property.Value: SELECT deliverable_id, submission_id FROM deliverable_lu CROSS JOIN project CROSS JOIN submission INNER JOIN submission_status_lu ON submission.submission_status_id = submission_status_lu.submission_status_id INNER JOIN upload ON submission.upload_id = upload.upload_id WHERE submission_status_lu.name = 'Active' AND deliverable_lu.per_submission = 1 AND upload.project_id = project.project_id AND

Property.name: context
Property.Value: SELECT submission_id FROM submission INNER JOIN upload ON submission.upload_id = upload.upload_id WHERE

Property.name: context
Property.Value: SELECT DISTINCT resource.resource_id FROM resource LEFT OUTER JOIN resource_submission ON resource.resource_id = resource_submission.resource_id LEFT OUTER JOIN resource_info ON resource.resource_id = resource_info.resource_id LEFT OUTER JOIN resource_info_type_lu ON resource_info.resource_info_type_id = resource_info_type_lu.resource_info_type_id WHERE

Property.name: context
Property.Value: SELECT DISTINCT resource_role_id FROM resource_role_lu WHERE

Property.name: context
Property.Value: SELECT DISTINCT external_ref_id, project_id, notification_type_id FROM notification WHERE

Property.name: context
Property.Value: SELECT DISTINCT notification_type_id FROM notification_type_lu WHERE

Property.name: context
Property.Value: SELECT DISTINCT review_id from review, scorecard, resource WHERE review.scorecard_id = scorecard.scorecard_id AND review.resource_id = resource.resource_id AND
